title: Rinc√≥n del Curao
description: Website that compiles prices of various beers, spirits, and wines sold in Chile. The frontend was built using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The backend handles GraphQL queries and was implemented using Apollo Server and TypeScript. The collected data is stored in MongoDB, and to obtain accurate product information, it is sourced from the DrinksAPI. Price collection is carried out daily at 8 am Chilean time.

title: Drinks API
description: REST API that handles different types of alcoholic beverages, currently specifying beers, spirits, and wines. This API allows you to list and filter the different items, and additionally, through an API key, it provides operations for adding, modifying, and deleting.

title: Portfolio
description: Portfolio with the purpose of showcasing both my skills and my projects, this portfolio includes a link to GitHub in order to access the projects and my calendar in an updated manner.

title: GitHub Calendar JSON
description: NPM package that provides the transformation of GitHub calendar contributions into JSON format. This package is being used in this portfolio.
